snippet.title: Para Bellum - Unknown Soldiers - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Download now for free! https://zagge.itch.io/para-bellum-the-unknown-soldiers


Spring 1945. War is soon coming to an end, but before that, a lot of people have to die. You're one of them. Just a soldier thrown in to the meat grinder. And then another. There's no purpose, there's no goal. It's up to you to determine your story. Are you just trying to survive? Are you a fanatical war hero? Not that it matters in the end, as truly you're just meat in the grinder. This is how you died.


I started this game as an attempt to make a statement about war and especially the brutality and unfairness of the Eastern Front of World War 2. There's no inherent goal in the game. It's a simulated combat sandbox in which you're thrown in to come up with your own goals and stories. I might continue developing the game further if I feel like it, fixing bugs and optimizing, I even have ideas for some future features, but we'll see.


Music is by amazing Mattia Cupelli. Song is called Redemption. Go check it out here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OVBpKlBveiI
